I am Yingqi Wang, and I am originally from Hubei,China. Now I am a second-year MHS student in General Epidemiology Methods(GEM) track under the Department of Epidemiology. My research intersts mainly focus on Pharmacoepidemiology and neurodegenerative disease, to be more specific, using real-world data to analyse the effectiveness and saftey of medications for Alzheimer's disease and Parkinson's disease.
